speachacts
Class Speachact

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--speachacts.Speachact
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnswerSpeachact, AskSpeachact, FacilitationSpeachact, SendSpeachact
public abstract class Speachact
extends java.lang.Object

Abstrakte Basisklasse für die unterschiedlichen Sprechakte.

Author:
Daniel Friedrich
